title: Is justice a form of revenge? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it is, the truest form of justice, you ever see that statue mistakenly called ”justice”?, she is actually Nemesis the Greek goddess of “retribution” that is making sure punisment is given where it is deserved but alas, she has been blinded by the stupidity of religion.

Justice demands every individual get’s what is owed him. Justice is not necessarily revenge. Justice can be reciprocal punishment that mirrors or corresponds to the crime. An eye for an eye but no more than an eye. Or, The wages of sin is death. The penalty exacted by society for murdering a member is forfeiture of your life as payment for the life you took. Revenge is retaliation not justice.
